channel.title: Outdated Saves in updated version
channel.description: After the auto-update to 1.0 I am no longer able to use my old game saves. Is there anyway to use those saves again or revert to the old version?!?! I was playing a game with the the non opt-in beta and bringing along the purple hat in XEN - so I really don't want to start over all the way at the beginning.

item.title: Outdated Saves in updated version

item.description:
Old saves can’t be used with updates. They are incompatable
